_header: Gods Son O shining bright splendour
Subjects: hymns, to Christ; Christ, hymns to
_description: The hymn ‘Splendor paterne glorie’ — eight stanzas rhyme royal

BLAdd34193.First Lines:
Goddys son oo shynyng bryght splendowreOf þe paternall and
                    eterne glorie…
BLAdd34193.Last Lines:
…ffadyr in son and son in fadyr isTo whom be lawd honoure
                    & endles blys. Amen
BLAdd34193.Editions:
Patterson,  Frank A. 
             The Middle English Penitential Lyric.
Columbia University Studies in English.
         New York: Columbia Press, 1911: 42-4.
Patterson,  Frank A. 
             “Hymnal from MS. Additional 34193, British Museum.”

            Roger Sherman Loomis, ed. 
         New York: Columbia UP, 1927: 443-88: 482-4.
